p: Also, to fight against deforestation and the risk of desertification, the Moroccan government developed 10-year program (2015â€“2024) through the High Commission for Water and Forests. The main strategic axes of this program for the argan woodlands are (i) fight against desertification, (ii) restauration of forest ecosystems, (iii) conservation and valorization of the argan tree, and (iv) economic development of forest ecosystems.
